PHASE SUMMARY — Kai-Koumou — late

Role: 
- Kai-Koumou is a Maori chief of high rank.
- He is the leader of the tribe that captured Glenarvan and Captain Mangles.

Traits:
- He has delicate and compact tattooing on his face and body.
- He is described as having an aquiline nose, tawny eyes, and abundant hair.

Relationships:
- He has a relationship with Glenarvan, as they have a conversation about exchanging Glenarvan and Captain Mangles for something.

Notable behaviors:
- He has taken Glenarvan and Captain Mangles captive, but has not maltreated them yet.
- He intends to exchange them, as mentioned in his conversation with Glenarvan.
